author: sky.cactus
content: You can jump forward by a large amount on Ethereum L1 (I know nothing about L2).  On L1 everything would just work.

author: elyx0
content: so if I lock 20millions to be released by the first caller on my birthday, there might be an incentive for miner to accelerate to it?

author: sky.cactus
content: Yes.  Timestamps on Ethereum under Proof of Work are manipulatable on short timescales.  Meaning they may be off by a minute or two, but they will (over time) always end up approximately correct over larger timescales.
